title: Ithaca
brief_description: A short 3D computer animation depicts a formation of ufos flying amongst the pyramids. A tour of some of the natural land forms around the world, we see mountains form, marbled rock formations and islands over a psychadelic sea. The ufo’s playfully fly amongst the various forms as if celebrating and surveying their creations.
